tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    theme VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    last_login TIMESTAMP,
    customization_settings JSON
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    course_id INT REFERENCES courses(course_id),
    score FLOAT,
    recommendation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
              email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
              created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE preferences (pref_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                   user_id INT,
                   language VARCHAR(20),
                   theme VARCHAR(20),
                   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE content (content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
               title VARCHAR(100),
               description TEXT,
               category VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE recommendations (rec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                     user_id INT,
                     content_id INT,
                     FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
                     FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES content(content_id))

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    theme VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_content (
    user_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    rating INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, content_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES content(content_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES content(content_id)
);
